This technique summons a flock of countless [[wikipedia:crow|crow]]s, dazzling the enemy. The user can freely manipulate the crows by emitting [[chakra]] from his fingertips and altering it into high frequency waves. Since the crows continuously clone themselves, the target becomes completely surrounded, obscuring their field of vision. When no longer needed, the crows will simply disappear in a puff of smoke.

== Trivia ==
* In ''[[Naruto Mobile]]'', Aoba uses this technique as the [[Summoning Technique]].
* In ''[[Naruto: One Decade, One Hundred Ninja]]'', this technique is described as a [[genjutsu]], even though it uses actual physical crows.<ref>''[[Naruto: One Decade, One Hundred Ninja]]'', page 67.</ref>
